item.title: Re-Engineer v/s Rewrite
item.description: We are engineers (can be safely generalised to humans), who at heart enjoy building not extending/enhancing/improving Disclaimer: doesn’t mean we don’t enjoy extending/enhancing. I strongly believe in the philosophy of – You touch it, you improve it! This is driven by the fact - programmers think old code is messy as Joel Spolsky writes – Itâ€™s harder to read code than to write it Having said that, programmers use tonne of external libraries & modules to avoid re-inventing the wheel.
